member.name: M:DLLVersionInspector.clsDLLVersionInspector.DetermineVersionDotNETDll(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines the version of a .NET DLL
member.returns: True if success, false if an error

member.name: M:DLLVersionInspector.clsDLLVersionInspector.DetermineVersionGenericDLL(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines the version of a generic Windows DLL
member.returns: True if success, false if an error
